English:
If you have completed eye calibra-
tion, the light above will be on. If 
not, please follow these steps: 
[Start] > [Application] > [Setting] > 
[System] > [Calibration] > [Eye Ca
libration]. If eye calibration is not 
done by you, please adjust it 
again to have the optimal experi-
ence.
Chinese:
若執行過Hololens2的眼球校正, 上
方的燈號將會亮起, 若沒有, 請到[
開始功能表] > [所有應用程式] > [
設定] > [系統] > [校正] > [執行眼
球校正] 進行校正, 若資料非本人
進行校正, 也請至該處再進行一次
校正.

English:
The main purpose of this app is to 
enhance the stability of visual fo-
cus on items. Without interfering 
your daily habits, this eye tracking 
system and equipment reinforce 
your focus with a mark. The aim is 
to improve target focus and the sta
-bility of spatial recognition. Come 
and experience it now!
Chinese:
本應用程式主要目的,是在加強視覺
焦點物體的穩定性.在不干擾生活習
慣的前提下,利用動眼偵測及影像設
備,給與焦點位置的強化標記,進而改
善焦點目標影像及空間感的穩定度.
現在就來體驗看看吧!

English: Hello, this is eye tracking tutorial.
Chinese: 使用者您好,這裡是動眼測試教學.

English:
The aim is to guide you through this 
product.
Chinese: 使這裡將指導您如何使用我們的產品.

English:
Please look at the cube on the left. 
Do not move your head. When you 
continue to focus on it or when your 
focus movement is slow, a green 
round mark will appear.
Chinese:
可以看到左邊有個方塊, 讓我們維持
頭部不動看向他, 當視線不動或以緩
慢的速度移動時, 會產生綠色圓球.

English:
After the green mark appears, the cu
-be will start to move. Please keep 
your head still, only following it with 
your eyes. Complete the challenge se
-veral times in or order to complete 
the tutorial. If fail, the cube restart at 
the beginning.
Chinese:
出現綠色圓球後, 方塊便會開始移動,
請保持頭部不動, 用視線跟隨, 完成數
次練習, 失敗則方塊回到原位置.

English: Let's move on to the next tutorial.
Chinese: 接著讓我們進行下一個練習.

English:
Keep your head still. When your line 
of sight movement is fast, a blue squ-
are will appear. Let's start this tutorial 
now.
Chinese:
當頭部維持不動, 視線快速轉移時, 會
在視線的終點產生藍色的方塊. 我們
馬上進行這個練習.

English:
Please look at the cube on the left. 
When a green cube appears, focus 
on it without moving your head. If 
fail, please try again.
Chinese:
請先盯著左邊的方塊, 當右邊出現綠色
的方塊時, 頭部維持不動將視線看向綠
色方塊. 如果失敗 再重複一次.

English:
Green cube will appear at random, 
please focus on them quickly, which 
will result in the appearance of blue 
cubes.
Chinese:
現在綠色方塊將會隨機出現, 請快速
用視線看向他們, 產生藍色方塊數次.

English:
Next, do not move your line of sight, 
instead, move your head to follow 
green cubes.
Chinese:
接著,讓我們測試視線不動, 頭部轉動
的跟隨方式.

English:
There will be a cube moving slowly 
right in front of you. Keep your line 
of sight to the front, and move your 
head to follow the cube. Complete 
this task several times.
Chinese:
現在, 正前方將出現方塊, 並緩緩移動,
請讓視線維持在正前方, 並使用轉頭的 
方式, 盯著方塊來回移動數次.

English:
A sphere will appear in front of you, 
it will  follow the movement of your 
head. Make it overlap with the cube 
in order to make the cube relocate.
Chinese:
圓球會出現在正前方, 並跟隨頭部運動
而改變位置 試著讓它與方塊重合, 觸
發方塊的移動.
